other_tests.findings: Carbonaceous material in the airways leading to all lobes of the lungs; tracheobronchial mucosa was inflamed and friable.
Pulses in the digits were minimal or absent initially; blood flow was detectable in the palmar arch and digital pulp after surgery.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Blood flow was detectable by Doppler ultrasonography after skin graft surgeries.

other_tests.findings: Skin of the arms and hands was charred and leathery with thrombosed vessels.
Performed to assist with ventilation post burn injury.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Good return of voice after decannulation.

other_tests.findings: 3+ edema of both lower lids, bilateral conjunctival chemosis, small epithelial defect in the right cornea, indicating thermal keratitis.
Released contracture of the posterior surface of the neck.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Substantial improvement in neck mobility post-surgery.
